7.eng-name: Rubbing hands and feet with dust (Tayammum)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdur Rahman bin Abza:`Ammar said to `Umar "I rolled myself in the dust and came to the Prophet (ﷺ) who said, 'Passing dusted hands over the face and the backs of the hands is sufficient for you

chapter.eng-name: Tayammum is for the hands and the face
